MAMIDIKUDURUb-Registrar, M
:: 2 ::
You are my son. In return for the love I have for you, I have written this settlement deed to you with the intention of giving you some immovable property free of charge for the development of your well. The property as per the schedule below is my ancestral property and I am enjoying full possession and rights of the village of Tatipaka. 7,28,000/-, literally seven lakhs and twenty-eight thousand rupees, I have given you the immovable property free of charge and without any consideration and have given you this settlement deed. I have given you possession of the said property on this very day. Therefore, from now on, you shall pay the government and panchayat taxes payable on the said property and enjoy it freely and happily with full possession, donation and sale rights for your children and grandchildren.
In this regard, no matter what obstacles or conflicts arise from anyone, I will remove them all at my own expense and will be able to implement this settlement property for you, your residents or me and my residents without any problems.
This Settlement Document is hereby issued in your name, stating that there are no other encumbrances, disputes, guarantees, agreements, mortgages or any other written or verbal acts of any kind whatsoever in respect of the property as per Schedule 9/77 and that the title, survey number, permit and boundaries of the property are correct and indisputable. This property is not an assignment land as per Act No. 9/77. een the hours of 3PM and 4PM on the

Declaration
What is being conveyed through this declaration is that in the context of preparing this document
Details of the property in the document, copies of 1B plots of land, links to documents. Tax receipts for places/houses, links to details of the parties in the document
Photos of the parties, property I/We have brought all the necessary documents including details and have thoroughly examined all the elements and have included them in this document and have prepared the document. No elements that should be written or included have been left out in this document. The schedule property has been physically examined and measured and the document has been prepared. I declare that I have not sold or mortgaged the said property to anyone else except for the sale to you, that this property is an undisputed property, that there are no dues to be paid on the said property, and that I am/will be able to pay the depreciation stamp duty found in the said property in the future upon inspection by the authorities (Registration and Stamps Revenue Department). I/We have not violated the provisions of Section 22-B of the Registration Act, 1908 and I/We shall be fully responsible for all matters relating thereto. I/We have no connection with the Sub-Registrar or the Registrar of Deeds. I/We shall be fully responsible for any and all matters arising out of or in connection with any such matter. sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 271 of 2026, dated 29/Jan/2026, executed by Kadali Venkateswarlu, in favour of his Son, Kadali Kiran Kumar, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 72.6 Sq. Yds., Located Nearby house number 3-67, comprised in survey number 127-1, situated in Tatipaka Village and Grama Panchayat, Razole Mandal, within the District of Dr. B.R. Ambedkar Konaseema, registered at sub-registrar office Mamidikuduru, is bounded as follows: North by: House Of Mallavarapu Veeramma South by: House Of Pothumudi Suneetha East by: Site of Amisha Begum West by: Road

It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or
Lease Deed

Note : It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
